Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 151 Sheridan buses temp rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago & Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago and Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green, Orange and Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green, Orange and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer on train at Clark/Lake. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green, Orange and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer on train at Clark/Lake.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
